text: Gufroni Al Maruf (born November 30, 1996) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Liga 2 club Persis Solo, on loan from Madura United. ==Career== ===Gresik United=== He made his professionally debut in the Liga 1 on April 18, 2017 against Persipura Jayapura. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Gresik United players Category:Madura United F.C. players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Gufroni Al Maruf
